summary: Tanner Hall is a vivid peek into the private world of an all-girls boarding school. In a cozy, but run-down New England, the knot of adolescent complexity is unraveled through the coming-of-age stories of four teenage girls.
cast: Rooney Mara|Georgia King|Brie Larson|Amy Ferguson|Tom Everett Scott|Amy Sedaris|Chris Kattan|Shawn Pyfrom|Ryan Schira|Susan Misner|Tara Subkoff|Annika Peterson|Alaina Lauren Steinberg|Konstantine Kakanias|Lowry Marshall|Joanne Burk|Alexia Rasmussen|Anne Ramsay|Hayley Goldbach|Alexis Kiernan|Justin Vogel|Mark Carter|Michael F. Thayer|Dan Butterworth|Russell Steinberg|Antonia Steinberg|Collin Brown|Tom DeNucci|Lillian Adams|Sydney Neill|Kate Skye Netto|Adriaan van Zyl|Tatiana von Fürstenberg|James Stratton|Ellen Becker-Gray|Kaitlyn Bouchard|Julia Cobain Clark|Desiree April Connolly|Yvonne DeNezzo|Francesca Gregorini|Patrick Mel Hayes|Olivia Iafrate|Michael Kelly|Rachel Knutton|Abe Mendel|Samuel Skeen|Rich Skinner|Vyvian B. Stevens|Darya Zabinski
keywords: female friendship|coming of age|boarding school|friendship|self injury
director: Directors: Francesca Gregorini, Tatiana von Fürstenberg (as Tatiana von Furstenberg)
title: Tanner Hall
